name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-create-notes-from-canvas
title: Create Notes From Canvas
shortDescription: This Canvas App is designed to handle notes related to an OOB (out-of-the-box) account table.
longDescription: This Canvas App is designed to handle notes related to an OOB (out-of-the-box) account table. Despite the default Notes table lacking an attachment column, weâ€™ve devised a workaround by creating a custom card with an attachment control.

references.name: Microsoft Power Platform documentation
references.description: Discover how to make the most of Microsoft Power Platform products with online training courses, docs, and videos covering product capabilities and how-to guides.
